Welcome to CardDeck’s documentation!¶

class card_lib.AceCard(suit)¶

Bases: card_lib.PlayingCard

Class for an Ace

class card_lib.Deck¶

Bases: object

Class that makes up the carddeck, constructor creating a deck with 52 different cards

draw_top()¶

Draws the top card of the deck

shuffle()¶

Shuffles the deck

class card_lib.Hand¶

Bases: object

Creates a Hand class

best_poker_hand(cards)¶

Calculates the best pokerhand for self.hand together with a given amount of cards (usually the board) param: cards = the board, or other list of cards

check_flush(cards)¶

Checks for flush in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_four_kind(cards)¶

Checks for four of a kind in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_full_house(cards)¶

Checks for the best full house in a list of cards (may be more than just 5)

param cards: A list of playing cards

check_pair(cards)¶

Checks for pairs in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_royal_sflush(cards)¶

Checks for royal flush in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_straight(cards)¶

Checks for the best straight in a list of cards (may be more than just 5)

param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_straight_flush(cards)¶

Checks for the best straight flush in a list of cards (may be more than just 5)

param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_three_kind(cards)¶

Checks for three of a kind in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

check_two_pair(cards)¶

Checks for two pairs in given list of cards param cards: A list of playing cards.

draw(amnt, deck)¶

Method for drawing the top card from a specific deck Params: amnt = amount of cards, deck = the deck from which cards should be drawn

droppingcards(index)¶

Removes cards from the hand in the indexed locations param: index = list of indices

sort()¶

Method for sorting the hand in reference to value and suit
